{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[place]]; to [[put]]; to [[lay down]]
# to [[add]]
#: {{zh-x|擱 點兒{r} 鹽|'''add''' some [[salt]]}}
# to [[hold]]; to [[contain]]
# to [[delay]]
# to [[bear]]; to [[stand]]; to [[endure]]
